body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install superlu@4.3+pic
==> Installing superlu                                                                                                                               
==> Searching for binary cache of superlu                                                                                                                 
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured                                                                                                
==> No binary for superlu found: installing from source                                                                                                       
==> Fetching http://crd-legacy.lbl.gov/~xiaoye/SuperLU/superlu_4.3.tar.gz                                                                       
==> Staging archive: /home/xap/local/opt/spack/var/spack/stage/superlu-4.3-qcz7yre6be2czwneixvhhln5zdiaek7t/superlu_4.3.tar.gz                    
==> Created stage in /home/xap/local/opt/spack/var/spack/stage/superlu-4.3-qcz7yre6be2czwneixvhhln5zdiaek7t                                              
==> No patches needed for superlu                                                                                                                         
==> Building superlu [Package]                                                                                                                              
==> Executing phase: 'install'                                                                                                                            
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:                                                                                                
    'make'                                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                         
2 errors found in build log:                                                                                                                           
     20    /home/xap/local/opt/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -O3 -fPIC -c timertst.c                                                                         
     21    /home/xap/local/opt/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -fPIC -o testtimer superlu_timer.o timertst.o                                           
     22    Testing machines parameters and timer                                                                                                    
     23    csh install.csh                                                                                                                                         
     24    make[1]: csh: Command not found                                                                                                           
     25    Makefile:15: recipe for target 'install.out' failed                                                                                                           
  >> 26    make[1]: *** [install.out] Error 127                                                                                                        
     27    make[1]: Leaving directory '/home/xap/local/opt/spack/var/spack/stage/superlu-4.3-qcz7yre6be2czwneixvhhln5zdiaek7t/SuperLU_4.3/INSTALL'         
     28    Makefile:28: recipe for target 'install' failed                                                                                                 
  >> 29    make: *** [install] Error 2                        
... # and the relevant part of the error message
```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a
Linux scramjet 4.15.0-55-generic #60-Ubuntu SMP Tue Jul 2 18:22:20 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS
``` 

### Additional information

Install csh `apt-get install csh` fixed the issue, but this is just a workaround.
title: Installation issue: superlu
